card_name: American Express Singapore Airlines KrisFlyer Credit Card

key_features: Receive S$150 cashback on your next purchase on singaporeair.com when you spend S$12,000 or more on eligible purchases within the qualifying period.
Up to S$350,000 Travel Inconvenience & Travel Accident Benefits

At MoneySmart, we strive to keep our information accurate and up to date. This information may be different from what you see when you visit a financial institution, service provider, or specific product site. MoneySmart shall not be liable to compensate the Customer should the information is not as updated as our Partner.
Please refer to the American Express website (go.amex/moneysmart) for the most up to date information on card benefits and its terms & conditions.
air_miles: 2 KrisFlyer miles = for every S$1 spent on eligible Singapore Airlines and Scoot flight bookings, and KrisShop purchases, with no cap.
Up to 2 KrisFlyer miles = for every S$1 spent on eligible Grab Singapore transactions up to S$200 spend in each calendar month.
1.1 KrisFlyer miles = for every S$1 spent on all other eligible purchases, with no cap.
No conversion fee, all KrisFlyer miles earned are conveniently credited directly into your KrisFlyer account
cash_back: Receive S$150 cashback on your next purchase on singaporeair.com when you spend S$12,000 or more on eligible purchases within the qualifying period.

eligibility: Charge a minimum of S$1,000 in eligible transactions to your credit card within 30 days from Card approval date
Not stackable with Amex BAU offer

fees.annual_fee: S$179.85 (incl. of 9% GST), waived for the first year
fees.supplementary_card_fee: S$54.50 (incl. of 9% GST) waived for the first year for the first 2 Supplementary Cards.
fees.annual_interest_rate: 27.80% p.a. compounded if payment of the closing balance in your statements is not made in full; or 3% p.a. on top of prevailing interest rate in the event that your account has three or more defaults in the last 12 months

minimum_income.singaporean_pr: Singaporean/PR Minimum Income Card application is subjected to customers meeting the regulatory minimum income requirement and internal assessment.
minimum_income.non_singaporean: Non-Singaporean Minimum Income Card application is subjected to customers meeting the regulatory minimum income requirement and internal assessment.
